title: How to update Garmin GPS with Garmin Express - Quora

response.answer_text: It is always best to upgrade the Garmin Map. Latest version will automatically remove the existing bugs. But before that, you need to check the current version of your device. This information will help you get rid of troubleshooting issues with the help of customer support. Steps to check the current version of your device: Go to settings & open "About"There you'll get the Unit ID/ Serial number, along with the software version.Automatic updates: After pairing with Garmin Connect app, you can update the software. But for auto updates, you need to enable the default setting. For doing so, follow the mentioned steps- Open the System menu by long pressing the top button.Scroll down & go to settings.Select Start/Stop.Choose system.Scroll it down, then go software update.Toggle the button between on and off.If you do the update via mobile, any available update will automatically be downloaded and installed in the background. Manual update: If you have followed all the steps mentioned above and it couldn't be done. Then you have to update it manually by following these steps- Open the system menu by long pressing the top button.Open settings & select start/stop.Choose system.Scroll to the bottom of the menu, you’ll find the version. Click on the install now option.Click on confirm to continue the installation.
